projects.title: Project with bulleted description
description: Javascript framework that automatically generates a portfolio website from resume data.
Ability to create image galleries for projects.
Ability to choose the order of different sections or skip sections entirely.
Ability to have custom named sections for projects.
Supports all major social networks icon.
The code for this entire site is generated by the framework. Nothing is hardcoded!

projects.title: Project with no link
description: To crete a bulleted list in the pop up
Each bullet item separated by comma

projects.title: Project with long paragraph description
projects.description: To create a paragraph description in the pop up, do not put content in [], just put it everything within the double quotes.

projects.title: Project with image gallery
projects.description: To create an image gallery in pop up, put the image URLs comma separated in gallery: []

projects.title: Top Ten Songs App
projects.description: Android app to play current top ten songs for an artist. Supports instant search for artists. Uses spotify API. Optimized for phone and tablet.

projects.title: Court Counter
projects.description: Android app to keep track of a basketball game score!

awards.description: Awarded to the team with the best senior design project within the ECE department. Project: INERTIA: Dead reckoning tracking system for application in GPS degraded environments.
